attributes.action: We are totally unhappy with this government,do not trust it,and want a referendum on europe,are being taxed far to much,business,s are struggleing and people can not make ends meet,we do not want gordon brown as prime minister and want an election when tony blair goes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That this board is a total con devised by our dictator tony bliar to make people believe he listens when he does not.Anything that goes against the dictators wishes will not be printed because he is fully aware that most people hate his european superstate plans and gradual destruction of britain this e petition site is a bloody joke.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
